trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Mosaal Ja is looking for someone who can fight.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the worried wivre-handler.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_TODO_01<tab>Use najool sacks to capture weakened fly agarics.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the squirming najool sacks to the worried wivre-handler.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Mosaal Ja.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_000<tab>You've seen your share of battle, I'd wager. My friend could use the help of someone like you.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_001<tab>He should be just south of here. Look for the Doppro down on his luck.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_002<tab>Head south and you should find my friend. Do what you can to help him.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_003<tab>Mosaal Ja sent you? Oh, thank goodness...
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_004<tab>My faithful wivre was injured on the job recently, so I thought I'd catch him some fly agarics as a treat. To cheer him up, if only a little.

TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_005<tab>Only, there's a reason I never hunt without my trusted wivre beside me. Those damned pests have been running me up and down the forest all <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_006<tab>Could you capture a couple of fly agarics in my stead? Once you tire them out, trap them in these najool sacks.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_007<tab>You'll find fly agarics south of here. Just make sure they're weak enough before trying to trap them.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_008<tab>Do you have the fly agarics?
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_009<tab>What a relief! Now my big boy can have something tasty to snack on. A Doppro who can't even care for his wivre is...well, a laughingstock.

TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_010<tab>Not only are we Doppro few in number, but we're physically no match for Hoobigo, and magically inept compared to Boonewa. That's why our blood was never considered for blessed siblings.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_011<tab>So long as we have our wivres, we have a place beside the others─which is why I want mine to recover as soon as he can.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_SOLDIERDOPPRO05109_000_012<tab>I'd best hurry home and make sure he does. Thank you for your help, stranger.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_013<tab>Found my friend, I take it?

TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_014<tab>I won't say prejudice against Doppro doesn't exist, but so far as I'm concerned, we all have our strengths and weaknesses. Neither Boonewa nor Hoobigo can ride wivres like they do.
TEXT_KINGZD110_05109_MOSAALJA_000_015<tab>Regardless, I hope his wivre recovers soon. I know how much he cares for it.
